paragraphs: Please note that the default value of trimSpaces is true

DirectQuerySender
SendersEndpointJDBC
QuerySender that interprets the input message as a query, possibly with attributes. Messages are expected to contain sql-text.

Please note that the default value of trimSpaces is true

See also
Github - DirectQuerySender Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.jdbc.DirectQuerySender
Syntax
Copy
<DirectQuerySender query=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
query	text	-
A SQL statement that calls a stored procedure. The statement should begin with the CALL or EXEC SQL keyword depending on SQL dialect. In case of doubt, the safe choice is to always start with CALL and choose Oracle dialect.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
queryType	options	OTHER
The query type. For stored procedures, valid query types are AbstractJdbcQuerySender.Q
